title: What were the expectations from the year 2020? How did it turn up to? - Quora

response.answer_text: I am usually an optimist but suspected it was going to be a very tough year and prepared for it, warned others to prepare for a tough economy later this year. So far I have had little impact on me personally but I feel the pain of so many around me and wish I could do more to help them. I still fear that the worst is yet to come so prepare if you can.
